Articles.Content:
Hello all,

There's an app available for free today on the Amazon app store called SimpleRockets. It's like a very cut down version of Kerbal space program for phone / tablet (they actually recommend Kerbal in the app). Worth a look for nothing!

http://www.amazon.co.uk/gp/product/B00ELOOYZI/ref=mas_faad

Thanks

Bertie
... Sorry, but Scott Manley and many other forum members posted about this. Almost every KSP player has Simple Rockets.

Fair enough, I did search on the forums but couldn't find anything about it being free today (although someone posted a new topic this evening with exactly the same thing and got far more replies than me!)
I wish I had an andrioid or IOS device to use this on, would like to try it.
